text: WWE 2K25 is an upcoming WWE wrestling video game for PlayStation and Xbox. Publisher is 2K Sports and developer is Visual Concepts. The game is set to release on March 14, 2025 with The Deadman and The Bloodline Edition of the game being available on March 7, 2025 == Sources == WWE 2K25 on The Smackdown Hotel Category:2025 video games Category:2K Sports games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Professional wrestling video games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games Category:WWE video games Category:Xbox One games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games
title: WWE 2K25
